    • CcddGroupHandler

      CcddGroupHandler(CcddUndoHandler undoHandler)
      Group handler class constructor
      Parameters:
      undoHandler - Reference to the undo handler; null if undo/redo operations are not needed for the groups

    • CcddGroupHandler

      CcddGroupHandler(CcddMain ccddMain, CcddUndoHandler undoHandler, Component component)
      Group handler class constructor. Load and build the group information class from the group definitions stored in the project database
      Parameters:
      ccddMain - Main class
      undoHandler - Reference to the undo handler
      component - GUI component over which to center any error dialog
